title: Bringing Your Parenting Fears to God
itunes:author: Guest: Teri Lynne Underwood
itunes:summary:
John and Danny offer advice to parents who are afraid of missing a hidden problem in their child's life.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast. Or, call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get the book "Praying for Girls" with your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-05-25?refcd=1103901

Get more resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/bringing-your-parenting-fears-to-god/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: http://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
